inn1.comm: fractionally short accompanied by a hint of away movement outside off, Qdk rides it to backward point
on a good length and outside off, Qdk guides it to third man off the face of the bat and gets off the mark
full and slides away with the angle outside off, nearly touching 140ks. Amla watches it through to Mushfiq
Amla shuffles around in the crease, Mustafizur slants it away from Amla with the angle. Ignored
pitched further up and on off, Amla jabs his bat down hurriedly and pushes it down to the man at mid-off
fuller length and swings away at 126ks, Amla yanks his bottom hand off the bat as he chips it in front of the covers
back of a length and comes in, Qdk gets an inside edge onto the pads. It dribbles onto the pitch and they pinch a quick single
back of a length and on off, Amla slithers across the off stump as he turns it to square leg
too full and straight, tucked away through backward square leg

big appeal for lbw, not given. This was slipping down leg. Mashrafe and Mushfiq confer and Bangladesh review. Back of a length and skids on to beat the inside edge and strike Qdk on the front pad. The projections show that it had pitched outside leg. This means that the hosts lose a review
room on offer outside off, Qdk rocks back and cuts it backward of point, skips away to the boundary
dug in on a back of a length and outside off, stroked past the covers
fullish and on the stumps, blocked back to the bowler

Mustafizur strikes and Chittagong roars.. Fuller and slides in with the angle, Qdk wants to whip it away over the leg side but does not connect. Mustafizur shoots through the gate and hits the leg stump. The bails get tipped off.
good length and tight line on off, patted past backward point for one
pitched up and on middle, Amla strides forward and drives it to mid-on
back of a length, skiddy ball on off, Amla is rooted to the crease as he punches it to point
back of a length and cuts away outside off with the angle. Amla flashes a cut and does not connect. Beaten
back of a length and just outside off, punched to the covers
good length and on middle, nudged in front of square leg
fractionally short and outside off, steered to third man
back of a length ball outside off, dabbed to the right of slip with soft hands
back of a length and rears up on Faf, who pulls his bottom hand off the bat and defends it off the splice
fuller and on middle and leg, Faf flicks it through backward square leg
pitched up and on off, Faf comes forward and drives it straight to short cover. The fielder under-arm flicks it onto the non-strikers' end but Amla was in. No threat
wide yorker outside off, Faf can's slice it away through the off side
fullish and on off, Faf keeps back and blocks it back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, stays low though. Faf stoops low and cuts it to deep third man
pitched up and on a fourth-stump line, nice straight-bat drive but finds mid-off
full and slanted across off, Amla gets forward and drives uppishly but threads the gap in the covers
slides in on off, Faf hangs in the crease and keeps it out
pitched up and on off, down the track, does not quite meet the pitch and drives it to the left of the bowler
veering onto the pads, nudged behind square on the leg side
flat and wide outside off, keeps low and dips under the flashing blade of Amla
arrows in with the angle and raps Amla on the front pad. Going down leg. Replays show that Amla had managed an inside edge as well
pushed through, Amla comes down the track. However, he does not meet the pitch and takes it on the pad
back of a length and strikes Faf on the thigh. Mustafiz goes up for a lbw appeal. No dice. It pitched outside leg
full and slides away outside off with the angle, left alone
back of a length and on off, Faf stays back in the crease and steers it to the right of wide slip, towards third man
fuller length and on off, tapped defensively to short cover
shortish and angling away outside off, Amla cuts and does not connect. Daylight between the bat and the ball here. No nick at all. Not even a scintilla of a nick.
back of a length and on off, Amla wants to flick to the leg side and ends up getting a leading edge in front of mid-off

Shakib strikes and reaches 199 ODI wickets. Tossed up full and drifts on off, Faf du Plessis folds low for a sweep but he does not connect with it properly. He skews it into the air off a thick top edge. Mushfiq moves forward and across to his left as he settles under it
tossed up on middle, defended
skiddy ball, stays low, kept out
full and on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
on a length and on middle, tapped back to the bowler
Rossouw uses his feet and drives a single to long-on
fullish and moves away outside off, Rossouw pokes and misses
on a length and on middle, pushed back to the bowler
half-volley on the leg stump, dispatched. Rossouw comes forward and whips it away, beats mid-on to his left
deflected off the pad behind square on the leg side
back of a length and on off, Amla camps back and punches it back to Rubel
very full and on off, wristy drive to the covers
flat and on the leg stump, punched to long-on
slower through the air and drifts in on middle, blocked gingerly
full and on middle, Amla advances down the track and drags it over mid-on. Not middled, off the inside half of the bat
Amla steps out, Shakib pushes this full on off. Quietly blocked
angled in on off, dropped in front of point
flat and quick on middle, down the track and clipped to mid-on. Amla wants a quick single but Rossouw is not interested
back of a length and on the hips, Rossouw can't find an escape route and flick it away
lifter outside off with loads of shoulder on it. Rossouw can't connect with the hook
full and on middle and leg, whippy push to mid-on
back of a length and on off, punched to the covers, straight to the fielder
dug in on a shortish length and outside off, crisply punched to the covers. Rubel has overstepped. He heel is on the line
banged in short and leaps outside off, Amla seeks to pull it away. He does not connect properly as he  top-edges it thickly to the covers. But this is a free hit
full and on the pads, flicked to mid-on
flatter and outside off, Amla leans back as he punches it out to deep cover. They push on for a couple
fuller and on middle, down the track and defended

Sabbir drops Amla. He comes down the track again, and targets the leg side but does not get hold of the strike. He mis-hits it and skies it. Sabbir runs back from mid-off, tries to get under it. The ball bobbles out. He can't pluck it on the rebound either. Amla could have been Shakib's 200th ODI scalp
flighted and on middle, blocked back to the bowler
slides on outside off, late-cut behind point
drifting onto the pads, knocked behind square leg
fractionally short and wide outside off, pulled firmly to deep midwicket
Rossouw skips down the track, Rubel drags his length back. Pushed back to the bowler, who hits the stumps at the strikers' but he is in
shortish and on a fourth-stump line, Rossow does not time the pull. Dragged to mid-on
fuller and outside off, guided to the right of backward point
good length and on off, drilled back to the bowler, who dives to his right in his followthrough and deflects it to mid-on
tight line on off, bunted in front of the covers
back of a length and on the pads, Rossouw rocks back, picks it up and pulls it behind square on the leg side
flighted and wide outside off, Rossouw camps back and cuts it away through backward point

And Amla becomes Shakib's 200th ODI victim.. Shakib gives this more air outside off. This one drifts in and then turns away to mess with Amla's attempted drive. He only feathers an edge behind to Mushfiq. Amla can't push on after being reprieved..
sliding down leg, helped with the angle to long leg, where the fielder fumbles. Swept away for a couple
quicker and on off, down the track and nearly chipped to short midwicket
skids outside off after pitching, keeps alarmingly low as well. Miller stoops low and is beaten
tossed up on the pads, blocked gingerly
tucked through square leg
full and on middle, Miller goes down on one knee for a sweep but can't beat a diving Mustafizur at 45

drifting down leg, helped to backward square leg for a quick single. Rossouw dives and makes his ground by the time Mushfiq collects the throw and whips the bails off. Bangladesh needed a direct hit there
looped up on off, blocked from the crease
slid through on off, leans back and cuts it to the off-side sweeper

Rossouw has been given out caught behind by umpire Gough as South Africa slip to 50 for 4. Rossouw and Miller converge and decide against a review. Looped up on off, grips in the pitch, keeps a bit low and spins away. Rossouw's balance is shot as he goes for a pull and nicks it behind via a bottom edge. Mushfiq swallows his third catch and Rossouw drags himself off the field..
dipping on middle, Duminy thrusts his bat in front of the pad and blocks
good length and on off, defended in front of the covers
slid through outside off, Duminy skips back and punches it to sweeper cover
flighted on middle, tapped to off
full and on middle, Miller attempts a paddle-sweep and gets an inside edge onto the pad. The ball rolls fine on the leg side
non-turning ball on off, defensive push to the covers
pitched up and on off, Duminy steps forward and drives it back to the bowler
even fuller and a hint of width, driven to long-off for one
nudged off the pads towards square leg
slides on middle, kept out off the back foot
lopped up on off, played back to the bowler off an inside edge
appeal for lbw, umpire Gough shakes his head. Slides on with the arm and raps him in front of the leg stump. It would have gone down leg
fuller and on middle, Miller, who was intending to hit squarer, goes down on one knee and sweeps it through midwicket
flat and quick, blocked to leg
another sweep and another four. Flatter and quick on a leg-stump line, swept away behind square leg. Beats Tamim, diving to his left, in the deep
slides on outside off, leans back and slaps it to deep cover
looped up outside off, Duminy strides forward and drives it to long-off
full and straight, clipped to midwicket
straight roller, blocked back to the bowler
good length and outside off, Duminy comes forward and eases it to deep cover
quicker and on middle and leg, defended to the left of the bowler
firmly struck.. Miller fetches this tossed-up ball from outside off and nails a sweep through midwicket. Nobody in the deep
darted quick, mis-hits a drive back to the bowler
pushed through outside off, cut straight to backward point
flat and turning away, punched to long-on
straight ball on middle, blocked back to the bowler
slides on a leg-stump leg, raps him on the front pad. Going down leg
drifting down leg, paddled to short fine leg
flat and fired on middle, cracked away to the covers
tossed up on off, guided to backward point
Duminy ventures down the track, this one slides in and takes the pad
pushed through, defended
fuller and around off, driven to long-off
he held this one back outside off, Miller is early into a big slog-sweep and is hit on the back thigh outside off
on a length and outside off, mistimed back to the bowler
flatter and on off, punchily defended back to the bowler
tossed up, knocked to short midwicket
pushed through outside off, chopped past slip
arm-ball outside off, cut strongly to sweeper cover
flighted and full on middle, milked to long-on for one
hurrying ball, punched to long-on
slid through outside off, chopped to the covers
Nasir holds this one back on off, Duminy answers with a dead bat
flighted on off, defended
Duminy goes on the back foot and cuts this flatter ball to sweeper cover
fired flat on off, kept out
good length and comes in, Duminy comes forward and blocks it gently to the covers
back of a length and kicks up from outside off, looks like a cutter. Duminy is surprised by the extra bounce but manages to steer a single to third man
fractionally short and just outside off, chopped towards vacant gully
full and straight, flicked behind square on the leg side
hurled in full and on middle and leg, clipped through midwicket
yorker at the base of off, Duminy jabs it to mid-on
full and on middle, Miller steps forward and taps it back to the bowler
low full toss outside off, Miller sinks to one knee and drags it to deep midwicket with a sweep
darted full and outside off, pushed down to long-off
Miller advances down the track, Nasir fires it in. Miller can't meet the pitch and wears it on his pad
slides on outside off, Miller backs away and hunts for a cut. He nicks it, Mushfiq aims to catch it, but the ball clangs off his glove
flat and outside off, punched to point
almost chopped on. Back of a length and cuts back, Miller manages an inside edge onto the pad. The ball just dribbles past the off stump
fuller and on off, Miller flicks  to short midwicket, where Mashrafe flings to his left and makes a smart stop
extra bounce on this shortish ball outside off, Duminy adjusts and steers it to off
pitched up and on off, Duminy gets forward and drives it to mid-off
good length and shade outside off, Duminy gets forward and bunts a single to cover-point

Mustafizur roars for lbw! Umpire Gough turns it down. Back of a length and swerves in from outside off, Miller can't connect with a flick. Off the thigh and rolls away. It would have sailed over the stumps
Miller has been really good with the sweep. Pushed through outside off, crashed away over midwicket
slides on outside off, keeps low, cut to deep cover
quicker through the air, swept behind square
pushed through outside off, Miller drives and misses. Oh wait, there was a nick there. Mushfiq goes low with the ball but can't hang on to it..
darted flat and quick, punched back to the bowler
looped up, driven smoothly to long-off
Miller twirls his wrists and flicks this one off the pads through backward square leg
Mashrafe strays on the pads again, Miller tucks another couple through backward square leg. Short fine leg chases and hunts it down
good length and on middle, pushed to mid-off for one for the fifty partnership
back of a length and outside off, slashed to third man
shortish and outside off, Miller goes on the back foot and punches it to backward point
too straight in line, turned straight to midwicket
clipped off the pads through backward square leg
arm-ball on middle, swept to short fine leg
down the track and driven to long-on
pushed through on off, Duminy now sweeps a single to the leg side
looped up nicely on middle, blocked onto the pitch
very full and width on offer, Miller takes toll of it as he thrashes a drive and sends it clattering past the covers, beats  sweeper
good length ball on middle, knocked to the covers
pitched up and on off, Duminy comes forward and slices it to the covers
short and outside off, Duminy rolls his wrists on the pull and places it behind square on the leg side, bisects deep square leg and long leg
back of a length and outside off, Duminy jabs it hurriedly to backward point
full and on middle, driven to Rubel at mid-off for a quick single

Mashrafe gets to 200 ODI wickets and breaks the stand! Back of a length and outside off, Miller wants to cut it away. He hits it in the air, Sabbir dives full-length to his right and pouches a sharp catch at backward point. He makes amends for dropping Amla earlier in the day at mid-off
pushed through, inside-edges it to midwicket
drifting down leg, helped to the right of short fine leg with a sweep
darted flat on the leg stump, jammed out onto the pitch off an inside edge
tickled off the pad in front of short fine leg
quicker on off, Behardien blocks it back to the bowler
straight ball on off, whipped to mid-on
gorgeous timing and placement. Pitched up and outside off, Duminy eases forward and laces it to the right of mid-off, Rubel chases in vain
room outside off, driven straight to the covers. Duminy din't middle the drive there
back of a length, worked to leg for one
banged in short and angled in, Behardien does not connect properly with the pull. Gets an inside edge onto his mid-riff area as the ball wanders away to the leg side
Duminy rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and steers it past backward point, to deep third man
dug in on a back of a length and outside off, sits up. Behardien stands tall and balanced as he punches a single to deep cover
sprayed down leg, he can't connect with the flick. Mushfiq can't stop it cleanly
good length and comes in, punched off the back foot to mid-on
fuller and outside off, slides past the attempted cut of Behardien
pitched further up and on off, pushed in front of Tamim at mid-on and they hare across for a speedy single. Tamim fails to effect a direct hit
back of a length and outside off, Duminy leans back and late-cuts it to third man
rising short ball on off, tests Behardien, who mis-controls a pull. Top-edges it, does not carry to long leg.
full and straight, clipped to short midwicket
full and drifts in, Behardien manages an inside edge onto the pad
fired on middle, down the track and whipped to long-on
flighted on middle and leg, Duminy folds low in the crease and paddles it behind square
tossed up on middle, Duminy steps out and bunts it to long-on
charming inside-out lofted-drive. Shakib gives this loads of air outside off, Behardien caresses it over the covers
Shakib retorts with a flat dart and beats Behardien, who was targetting the leg side
full and outside off, Duminy wants to force a drive through the covers. Offcutter from Rubel, Duminy was early into the stroke and edges it through vacant slip
back of a length and slides away outside off, beats Duminy's cut
whipped off the pads to deep midwicket
back of a length and outside off, glided to the left of deep third man
good length and on middle, Behardien keeps back and flicks to midwicket
banged in short and hurries onto Behardien, who pulls with a top edge. It balloons in the air and dies down in front of Nasir at deep backward square leg
full and on the stumps, Behardien secures a single to long-on

Behardien holes out to long-on! Looped up on middle, he runs down the track and punts it towards long-on. The fielder snaps up an overhead catch, but realising that the momentum would carry him over the ropes, Sabbir holds his balance, tosses the ball in the air, and takes it on the rebound
skiddy ball outside off, Duminy takes it from there and whips it to midwicket
pitched up and on off, Rabada drives through the covers
Duminy comes down the track, the bowler drags his length back. Punched to long-off
slower through the air and outside off, poked to short third man
slides on off, Rabada stands tall and punches it back to the bowler
overpitched and outside off, Duminy drives it firmly towards deep cover and runs back for the second
offcutter outside off, Duminy is early into the shot. He aims to turn it to the leg side and gets an edge through vacant slip cordon
yorker on the stumps, Rabada sits back and blocks it back to the bowler
The Mustafizur cutter consumes Rabada. This one grips in the pitch and hoodwinks Rabada, who gets forward and does not connect with the drive. Sneaks through the bat-pad gap and hits middle and off
fullish and on the pads, chipped to the right of the bowler, to mid-on
picked away off the pads to long leg
tossed up and drifts in, blocked off the back foot
pushed through on middle, he gets an inside edge onto the pad. The ball dribbles to off
flat ball, punched to the covers
full and on the stumps, punched to long-on
flat and on the leg stump, controls a pull through backward square leg
pushed through on a leg-stump line, bunted to long-on
back of a length and on off, hangs back and punches a single to mid-off
full and outside off, Duminy shuffles across off, goes for a lap sweep and misses
darted full and outside off, whipped to long-on
fuller and on middle and leg, whipped in the air over backward square leg
full toss outside off, mis-hits it to long-on. Around the waistline. Not called a no-ball
on a length and outside off, deftly dabbed to short third man and Duminy reaches his fifty
full toss outside off, above the waistline. Umpire Gough calls it a no-ball. Duminy swings and misses
wide yorker outside off, squeezes it out to sweeper cover

bowled'em.. Rubel spears a yorker right in the blockhole. Abbott sits back and wants to hack it to the leg side but does not connect. Rubel nails the middle stump. The umpire checks for a front-foot no-ball. Rubel is okay.
full and on off, More pushes it to mid-off. Duminy sets off for a quick single but is belatedly sent back. A direct hit would have consumed Duminy
full and on the stumps, drilled back to the bowler
length and on middle and leg, dragged to deep midwicket off the inside half of the bat

Duminy perishes off the final ball. The Bangladesh players get together. Goodish length and slides away outside off with the angle, Duminy throws his bat at it and skies it. Litton Das judges it well at point and swallows it

inn2.comm: good length and curves away in the channel. Ignored
veering onto the hips, tucked neatly to long leg
short and on middle and leg, cramps Soumya for room. Mistimes a pull as it only trickles in front of midwicket
pitched up and on off, nice knee bend as Tamim drives with a straight bat to mid-off
back of a length and keeps going away outside off with the angle, left alone
good length ball on off, patted in front of the covers. Tamim does not want to go for a chanced single. He sends Soumya back
short and outside off, Soumya stands tall and punches to point
short and rears up on middle, Soumya fends it to the off side
short and sprayed wide outside off, past the tram-line and the slash of Soumya
back of a length and on off, Soumya seeks to punchily drive it but drags it to the leg side off an inside edge
glanced off the hips to long leg
fractionally short on middle, no lateral movement. Hacked to mid-on
back of a length and on middle, tapped to the off side
back of a length and comes in on middle, knocked to midwicket
good length and outside off, Tamim strides forward and blocks it solidly to the covers

Abbott appeals for lbw, umpire Gough is not interested. Comes in onto the pads, glanced to long leg off an inner edge. They hustle across for two. It could have been tighter had Qdk collected the throw
on a length and outside off, driven to the right of mid-off
back of a length and outside off, punched to the covers
fuller length and on the stumps, drills a drive to mid-off
short and wide outside off, flat-batted to mid-off sans any power
lifter, gets too big on the batsman and beats his attempted hook. QdK leaps up and takes it. Too high and wide called
shot! Back of a length and outside off, Soumya Sarkar crunches it between point and the covers. Hit the gap well
dug in short and outside off, Soumya aims for a cut and just about cracks it over a leaping extra-cover
back of a length and on the leg stump, Tamim keeps back. He wants to turn it to the leg side and gets a leading edge to off
full and too angled wide outside off, Tamim flashes and misses. Wide called
good length and angling away outside off, driven to point
back of a length and on off, blocked to the covers
Morkel slides down leg right away, deflected off the thigh fine on the leg side
good length and on off, brings Tamim forward into a defensive push
clipped off the hips to short fine leg
dropped short and on middle, Soumya skips back and pulls it over midwicket
loads of extra bounce! Back of a length and curves away outside off with the angle. Soumya wafts and watches the ball zip past the outside edge
straying onto the pads, fine leg inside the circle. Soumya whirls his wrists and gives it marching orders finer of the man at 45. Very minimal effort required to put those away
good length and on middle, dabbed to point
lifting ball, Tamim blunts it to the leg side
sprayed onto the hips again, tucked to long leg. Morne cuts it off in the deep
full and on the stumps, Soumya camps back and looks to slug it away to the leg side. He gets it to long leg off the inside half of the bat
extra bounce on this shortish ball outside off, Tamim adjusts, gets on top of the bounce. Opens the face of the bat and punches it crisply in the gap between backward point and short third man
veering onto the leg stump, Tamim does not connect with the flick. Off the pad and rolls to the leg side
back of a length and on a leg-stump line, eased behind square on the leg side
good length and on middle, Soumya hangs back and steers it to deep third man
tight line on middle and off, Tamim pats it to the covers
full and on off, driven to mid-off and Tamim calls for a speedy single
short and climbs outside off, Soumya leaps off his feet and directs it to third man

superb timing. This was not a good ball, though. Too full and on middle and leg, Tamim leans across as he times a flick between midwicket and mid-on, skips away to the boundary. The crowd enjoying this in Chittagong!
Rabada drifts on the pads, Soumya misses the flick and takes it on the pad
back of a length and too straight in line, Soumya brings his wrists into play and picks it up over midwicket
one-bounce four! Full and on off, Soumya ventures deep in the crease and launches it over mid-on
three in a row for Soumya. He goes BOOM, BOOM, BOOM. Not Tamim. Bangladesh scoot to fifty in 7.3 overs. Back of a length and outside off, sits up. Soumya goes back and slams it wide of midwicket
full and on middle, Soumya shuffles across, opens the face of his bat and runs it to third man
banged in short and rises to foil Tamim's pull. Spliced to mid-on
flatter and fired on the pads, pulled to deep square leg
Tahir drags it down, Soumya fetches this from outside off and clatters a pull to the left of midwicket
looped up on middle, blocked
floated and full on middle, steered to the covers
straight ball on middle, defended onto the pitch
flighted offbreak on off, Soumya comes forward to smother it
tossed up on middle, driven to the covers
Tamim stretches forward, pats his bat in front of the pad and blocks
drifting down leg, wide
flat and full on middle, dug out to off
darted and turning away outside off, slapped to deep cover
flat and hurled on middle, kept out
loopy full toss outside off, Soumya wants to drive to off but skews it to leg off an inside edge
full ball, driven to long-on
back of a length and spins in, punchily played back to the bowler
Tahir gives this more air on middle, blocked
drifting down leg, Tamim does not connect with a sweep
Tamim comes down the track, Tahir fires it flat and quick. He thrusts his pad and kicks it away
slides on outside off, guided to point
flat and outside off with extra bounce. Looks like a googly. Poked to third man
looped up on off, Tamim gets forward to drive and gets an inside edge to mid-on
looped up and drifts in, Tam strides forward and is hit on the pad. Perhaps, going down leg
Tamim skips down the track, does not quite meet the pitch. But hacks it with the angle over midwicket
full and on the leg stump, down the track and forced to mid-on
full and on middle, down the track and drilled back to the bowler. Duminy takes it on his left thigh. He is hobbling in some pain
flighted and on the stumps, inside-edges it to mid-on
shortish and turns in, mistimed punch back to the bowler
quick offbreak, tucked off the back foot to leg for one
flat and outside off, Tamim stands tall and punches it to the covers
spinning down leg, wide called
pushed through outside off, Tamim gets forward and pads it away
pitched up and on off, Tamim is drawn forward as he pokes it to the covers off the outside half of the bat
flatter and sliding down leg, deflected to fine leg off the pad
tossed up and on middle, driven firmly past the diving short cover to long-off
Tamim skips out and yorks himself. Dug out
slides on, Tamim leans back and punches to the covers
drifting down leg, helped to backward square leg
pushed through on the stumps, mis-hit drive to mid-on
pitched up and on off, driven to long-off
clears mid-off.. Full and flat on off, he just about chips it over Abbott, who leaps at mid-off
dragged down, he rocks back and pulls it over midwicket
drags a googly short and wide outside off, cut to the covers. Not middled
skiddy ball outside off. Tamim hangs back and pokes it past lone slip off a fortunate outside off. The fielder fumbles in the deep and gives away four
dishes out a full toss outside off, pushed to the right of mid-off, who dives in vain
Tamim has settled into his groove. He dances down the track and meets the pitch of this full ball outside off before middling a drive between the covers and mid-off
banged in short on leg, Soumya swivels on the back foot and controls a pull to deep backward square leg
Tamim races down the track, Morne bangs it short and outside off, Carved to Behardien at sweeper cover on the bounce
bumper down leg, Soumya sinks under it. Wide called
poor ball, sliding down the leg side. Eased fine of short fine leg. Soumya gets to his second successive fifty. He thumps his chest and celebrates
good length, pushed to mid-on
back of a length, Tamim keeps back and chops it tantalisingly past the off stump to keeper
short and on middle, fended to off
full and on middle, down the track and drilled to the covers
slower through the air and on the pads, nudged through midwicket
flat and straight on middle, punched back to Tahir
short and turning away outside off, cut away to the covers
drifting down the leg side, Tamim folds low in the crease and sweeps a single to long leg
shot... A tad overpitched and outside off, Sarkar lays into a drive and sends it racing past the covers, it picks up pace and thuds into the boundary
on  a length and on middle, pushed to mid-on
good length and angling away outside off, flayed to deep backward point
lifter outside off, swings and misses. Beaten by extra bounce
short and outside off, Soumya shuffles across off and semi-flicks, semi-pulls it behind square on the leg side
on a length and outside off, he clears his front leg and hammers it over deep midwicket. Soumya marmalised that...
short and outside off, chopped behind to the keeper
Tamim stays back and steers this full ball outside off to third man
bouncer sails through to QdK as Soumya hooks and misses
short and wide outside off, Soumya arches back and glides it to third man
Tamim charges down the track, Abbott pulls his length back. Chopped behind point to third man
yorker on the leg stump, dug out
lifting short ball on middle, Soumya arches his back and ramps it up and over the keeper. That is some shot!
short of a length and on middle, Tamim gets right behind the line in defence
length and outside off, slides it to the left of Tahir at third man off the face of the bat
banged in short, Tamim goes for a hook and misses. He takes it below the rib-cage
Soumya steps away and makes room outside leg. The bowler shortens his length. Dragged to mid-on

Behardien misjudges it at sweeper cover. Tamim races down the track, Morkel drags his length back further and hurls it outside off. Carved over the covers, Behardien runs forward and across, dives to his left but does not even get a hand onto it as the ball drifts away from him. But that should have been taken, considering the modern standards
another lifter, he looks to hook and scoops it behind square on the off side off the toe-end of the bat
back of a length and on middle, Tamim pulls his bottom hand off the bat and defends
tucked off the pads through backward square leg
Soumya stays back and guides this length ball outside off to third man
bumpy short ball, Tamim does well to control a pull behind square
throws his bat at a wide, full ball and does not connect
full and slides away outside off with the angle, late-cuts and does not connect
back of a length and on middle, nudged in front of midwicket
flicked off the pads in front of square on the leg side
short and Rabada pulls the pace off this, Soumya is pushed back and nearly plays on
dug in short and on middle, Soumya now pulls and smashes it past midwicket. Duminy runs across from deep square leg and slides in vain
full toss on middle, spliced to the covers
another slower one from Rabada, Soumya can't run it down to third man. Fooled by the change of pace
Tamim, the local boy, reaches a fifty with a glide past backward point. He raises his bat, acknowledges the cheers and hugs his partner. This has been a more controlled innings
Soumya waits on this one outside off and steers it expertly through the vacant slip cordon, runs away to the third man boundary
low full toss on off, whipped to long-on for a couple
slower back of a length ball outside off, swipes and does not connect
right in the blockhole, jammed back to the bowler
top, top strike from Soumya. A tad overpitched and outside off, he sends it scurrying past the covers with a powerful drive. What a way to bring the 150 partnership
turned off the pads behind square for one
back of a length and on the hips, picked away to short fine leg
back of a length and on middle, blocked
back of a length and on middle, knocked to midwicket
Soumya makes room. Full and wide outside off, flashes and misses
pitched up and outside off, secures a single to deep third man
straight ball on middle, bunted to the covers
length ball just a shade outside off, blocked off the back foot
full on the stumps, wristy drive to the covers

soft, soft end to a powerful innings. No century for Soumya. South Africa hardly celebrate. He shakes his head ruefully as he trudges back. He looks to drive this flighted ball and ends up chipping it into the hands of Amla at short cover
darted full and slides on off, too close to cut. Chopped behind the wicket
googly ducks back in, Litton does not pick it. He plays and misses, taking it on the thigh
good length and on middle, mistimes a drive to the left of the bowler off the inside half of the bat
cracker of a hit! Full and outside off, down the track, makes room and thumps it over the covers. One-bounce four
quicker and shorter outside off, latest of late-cuts it to the right of short third man
looped up and outside off, pokes and misses
tucked from off to deep square leg
slid down leg, wide
another leg-side wide
flighted and on off, he nips down the track and forces it over the covers
Bangladesh take their fourth series in a row. Might have been an attempted googly. Dragged down, Litton skips back and pulls it over midwicket to spark celebrations in Chittagong!
